post.body: Happy Birthday! Hope to meet FTF in 2009.
Happy New Year! sing loud! We always stay home and take down Holiday decorations. btw celebrated 30th anniversary yesterday
I nominate @RichSchefren for a Shorty Award in #Business because Rich is the reason I am on twitter and the guru to the gurus
I nominate @JeffWalker for a Shorty Award in #Product_ Launches because he is the master we all look to for success insights
I nominate @MikeFilsaime for a Shorty Award in #conversion because he is the godfather of the OTO upsell downsell upsell idea
I nominate @masscontrolkern for a Shorty Award in #copywriting because Frank has irresistable offers and loves people
I nominate @JohnReese for a Shorty Award in #traffic because he is the godfather of traffic secrets for the masses
I nominate @RossGoldberg for a Shorty Award in #traffic because he totally knows the value of traffic in revenue generation
I nominate @MariSmith for a #socialmedia Shorty Award
@TomBeal thank you for the live video tonight, great content, I will have my IAW up tomorrow http://nowview.me/tIF :-)
marriage secrets: never go to bed mad at each other, give 110%, don't sweat the small stuff, don't try to change your spouse
Congratulations on 12 years of marriage, My goal is to make it to my 60th anniversary like my grandparents did!
Thanks for the phone call. It was great to hear your voice and you were the only marketer that called me personally today.
If you get a chance the Ritz-Carlton Resort in Half Moon Bay is worth a trip. 5 stars with breath taking beauty and good food too
I like the HP Mini 1000 xp netbook. It has the led screen, big enough keyboard and the 1033CL from Costco has 2 yrs warranty.
live with @harrisfellman, a very patient and kind person.
watching @MikeFilsaime and @TimBeal live at the 7figurezone, much better than a webinar or teleseminar. Hi Mike Hi Tom
Celebrating 30 years of marriage today!
This video scared me http://clients.profollow.com/b/1FJGV
Heading out to the Ritz-Carlton, Half Moon Bay for lunch for my MIL's 80th birthday
